alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 7:18AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Suffolk County through 815 AM EDT... At 717 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Calverton, or over Wading River, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Riverhead, Manorville, Wading River, Mattituck, Southampton, Calverton, Shinnecock Hills, Peconic, Hampton Bays, Flanders, North Sea, Cutchogue, Aquebogue, Jamesport and Laurel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
